title: Blended Teaching Methods Workshop for Enhancing Early Childhood STEM Education Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen early childhood STEM education competencies for in-service elementary teachers, emphasizing gender-unbiased science education approaches.

learning_goals: Participants can explain at least three methods to exclude gender role stereotypes when designing STEM activities for young children.
Apply at least two integrated digital/offline strategies for operating early childhood STEM education in blended learning environments.
Develop at least one assessable STEM literacy evaluation tool for young children applicable in educational settings.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
